member.name: T:ParaglidingWeatherBot.Core.Direction
member.summary: Represents the set of 32 compass points. Each point has an angular range of 11.250 degrees where: middle azimuth is the horizontal angular direction (from north) of the given compass bearing; minimum is the lower angular limit of the compass point; and maximum is the upper angular limit of the compass point.

member.summary: Represents a data reader that returns a weather forecast.
